2834.name: BANNED_DEVICE_IN_NEX_SERVICE_TEMPORARILY
2834.message:
Online services cannot be used.

Please make a note of the error code
and visit support.nintendo.com.
2834.short_description: Your console is temporarily banned from this game
2834.long_description: Your console has been temporarily banned from this game for breaking the rules.
2834.short_solution: Wait for the ban to expire
2834.long_solution: Wait for the ban to expire or appeal it on the forum.
